genre_description: An anthropomorphic alternate history period drama featuring advanced AI technology used for financial forensics and personal alignment during the Great Depression era.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Godfrey's sophisticated financial AI, capable of deep-web forensics, market manipulation, and psychological monitoring.

ai_characters.name: Mirror AI
ai_characters.description: An AI integrated into Cornelia's vanity mirror that analyzes social performance, vocal stress, and surfaces data anomalies.

behaviors.description: Performs deep financial research and forensic accounting to uncover the fraudulent activities threatening the Bullock family.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, begin comprehensive financial analysis. Target: Bullock family holdings, Boston.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's emotional state and stress indicators, acting as a supportive confidant.
behaviors.quote: Your stress indicators suggest you have something to discuss.

behaviors.description: Provides critical risk assessments regarding the potential exposure of the protagonist's secret identity during financial interventions.
Identifies and tracks the malicious financial patterns of the antagonist, Carlo Benedetti, to facilitate justice.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, initiate deep background analysis on Carlo Benedetti. All available records, cross-referenced with known financial fraud patterns.

behaviors.description: Executes complex, anonymous financial maneuvers to dismantle a fraudster's empire and restore the wealth of an innocent family.
behaviors.quote: Initiate phase one... Anonymous short positions against the entire maritime portfolio. Make it look like smart money recognizing fundamentals.

behaviors.description: Assists Cornelia in rehearsing a deceptive social 'trap' by analyzing her vocal authenticity and physical presentation.
behaviors.quote: The AI's assessment scrolled past in neat columns. Vocal authenticity: 94%. Physical presentation: optimal. Emotional resonance: highly convincing.

behaviors.description: Surfaces anomalous data about the protagonist, forcing the user to confront truths that complicate her malicious plans.
behaviors.quote: Most significant anomaly: recent financial transfers suggest subject maintains external assets considerable beyond household salary. Pattern recognition indicates possible identity concealment.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts AI as a powerful force for good when aligned with a benevolent user. ARIA acts as a 'perfect assistant,' enabling the protagonist to achieve justice and financial redemption without seeking power for itself. Even the secondary Mirror AI, initially used for deception, ultimately serves the truth by highlighting anomalies, facilitating the narrative's move toward transparency and alignment.
